desc.p: A valid group as defined in APPL.GEN.CONDITION for MD application. (e.g.: NON-RESIDENT) Or C-XXXXXX where XXXXXX is the customer id. (e.g.: C-100053).

t.desc:
The cash margin percentage to be used for this group or customer
.
Validation Rules:

desc.p: A valid category in the range defined in MD.PARAMETER for the respective deal sub type.
Should be a valid category in the CATEGORY table.
The default account to be used for crediting cash margin.
Input only if the ID is C-XXXXXX
Cannot be the same as DEBIT.PROV.ACCOUNT.
A valid deal sub type as defined in MD.PARAMETER.
Deal sub type cannot be duplicated.
The default account to be used for debiting cash margin.
Input only if the ID is C-XXXXXX
Cannot be the same as CREDIT.PROV.ACCOUNT.
Value in this field decides the stage at which the customer's limit must be updated when request for issuance of guarantee is initiated through Internet Banking.
Allowed only for Internet enabled customers.
Allowed values are "YES" or "NO".
If "YES", the customer's limit will be checked and updated when the Corporate customer requests for issuance of guarantee through Internet Banking.
If "NO", then the customer's limit will be checked and updated only when the request is approved at the Bank side.
Value defined here will override the condition defined in MD.PARAMETER.
A valid category in the range defined in MD.PARAMETER for the respective deal sub type.
Should be a valid category in the CATEGORY table.
Percentage of the system calculated commission that needs to be applied for specific customer or group of customer. Applied only for system defaulted rate from MD.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION.
Not allowed when rate or amount specified.
Acceptable input is any value from 0 to 100 expressed as a percentage.
Value ‘0’ means no commission and ‘100’ means the entire calculated commission is to be applied in the transaction.
Takes precedence over conditions defined in MD.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION
User input field for fixed commission rate.
Not allowed when amount or percentage specified.
Takes precedence over conditions defined in MD.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION
User input field to define the currency in which the fixed commission to be taken.
Currency and amount are associated fields.
Not allowed when rate or percent specified.
Takes precedence over conditions defined in MD.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION
User input field to define fixed commission amount
Currency and amount are associated fields.
Not allowed when rate or percent specified.
Takes precedence over conditions defined in MD.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION
